Title: Content-Type Insufficient Restrictions Bypass
Description: There is a flaw in the json() function in bottle.py. The issue is due to the program using insufficient restrictions when parsing JSON content-types. This may allow a remote attacker to bypass access restrictions.
AffectedVersions: All versions after 0.11.0 before 0.11.7, all versions after 0.12.0 before 0.12.6
Solution: Upgrade to version 0.11.7 and 0.12.6, or higher.
